entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: FyTube - YouTube Without Ads
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫899,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and lets you play any video with exclusive features designed just for you! Highlight Features: ‚Ä¢ Locked screen playback: Keep listening to your videos‚Äô audio in the background. ‚Ä¢ Floating playback (PIP): Use other apps while watching your videos. ‚Ä¢ Sleep timer: Set an automatic shutdown and relax worry-free. ‚Ä¢ Loop mode: Play your favorite video on infinite repeat. It also includes: ‚Ä¢ Toggleable subtitles ‚Ä¢ Playback speed control ‚Ä¢ Quality selection and fullscreen mode ‚Ä¢ Smart search with real-time suggestions (predictive search) ‚Ä¢ Upload date filters: Day, week, month, or year FyTube is perfect for those who don‚Äôt want to miss a single video about their favorite topics. Explore, play, and enjoy your favorite content to the fullest ‚Äî interruption-free! SPECIAL FEATURES FLOATING PLAYBACK Never stop watching! With this feature, you can keep watching your videos while using other apps . Just enter fullscreen mode and tap the PIP button ‚Äî it‚Äôs the second icon at the top of the player. Your video will float on top of your screen no matter what app you open! LOCKED SCREEN PLAYBACK Listen without interruptions! Keep enjoying your video‚Äôs audio even when your screen is off. Perfect for listening to music, podcasts, or your favorite tunes while driving or relaxing. How to activate it? Just lock your device screen. You‚Äôll instantly see the background player. Tap Play ‚Äî and that‚Äôs it! The audio will keep going without pauses. SLEEP TIMER Fall asleep peacefully ‚Äî your app will stop by itself! Enable this feature to automatically stop your videos after the time you choose. Perfect for sleeping or napping without worrying about stopping anything. How to activate it? Tap the timer button, choose how long you want it to run, and that‚Äôs it. Relax and let the app handle the rest! LOOP MODE Play your favorite video over and over again! Enable this feature to make the video repeat automatically as many times as you want. How to know if it‚Äôs on? The icon will turn red when active. (VoiceOver compatible: it will indicate whether it‚Äôs on or off.) Perfect for songs, meditations, or any content you love to repeat! Need help using these features? Visit: fydub.com/fytube BASIC FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Fullscreen high-quality video playback ‚Ä¢ Easy-to-use interface, friendly design ‚Ä¢ Skip forward or rewind anytime ‚Äî never miss the best parts ‚Ä¢ Subtitle activation ‚Ä¢ Adjust playback speed to your preference ‚Ä¢ Change video quality ‚Ä¢ Smart search with real-time suggestions and upload date filters: day, week, month, year, all ‚Ä¢ Each video includes a related videos section to discover more interesting content ‚Ä¢ Discover the latest videos and stay up to date with the news ‚Ä¢ Our app connects directly to YouTube, letting you find any video ‚Ä¢ Enjoy content on any AirPlay-compatible device ‚Ä¢ VoiceOver compatible (enhanced descriptions) ‚Ä¢ No account required ‚Ä¢ We don‚Äôt store cache, cookies, or personal data without your permission ‚Äî watch safely ‚Ä¢ Interface available in 29 languages ‚Ä¢ NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS Get FyTube with a one-time payment and start a new streaming experience ‚Äî ad-free and subscription-free. Minimum Requirements: ‚Ä¢ iOS 13 or later ‚Ä¢ 3G connection or higher Privacy Policy: https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube Terms of Service: https://fydub.com/terms-of-service_fytube Keywords related to our app: youtube, youtube music, youtube vanced, ad blocker for YouTube, no subscription, skip ads on YouTube, music without ads, ad-free, YouTube app, adblocker for YouTube, block pop-ups, remove ads, block ads, adblock, content blocker, no ads, ad-free browser, block advertising, skip ads, ad-free music, YouTube without ads, videos without ads, etc. Have questions about how to use FyTube? Visit fydub.com/fytube or write to us ‚Äî we‚Äôll be happy to help. We reply to all emails: fytube@fydub.com FyTube works with YouTube. The YouTube name and logo are trademarks of Google, Inc. All rights reserved. ¬© FyTube¬Æ

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Inspire Pro
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫899,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫449,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫899,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫449,99

Application Description

Available exclusively on the App Store, meticulously designed to be beautifully powerful, and painstakingly engineered for iPad ‚Äî Inspire Pro delivers an incredibly fast and realistic painting, drawing, and sketching experience that you can take with you wherever you go and use whenever inspiration strikes. Our proprietary painting engine Sorcery‚Ñ¢ takes full advantage of the GPU to render brush strokes with brilliant 64-bit colour, laser-sharp sub-pixel precision, and insanely fast speed. While the strokes of a wet oil paint brush look beautiful on their own, the breathtaking blending effects of a dry brush will absolutely stun you. Graze the canvas with just a bit of pressure to add a subtle blur to your artwork or use stronger pressure to actually mix existing colours on the canvas together to create new ones. Whether you are a budding artist, seasoned professional, or somewhere in-between, you will enjoy the simplicity and power of the most intuitive and compelling illustration app for iPad, Inspire Pro. Amazing Brushes ‚Ä¢ 150 high-quality brushes to choose from, divided into 15 sets: Oil Paint, Airbrushes, Spray Paint, Paint Splatter, Graphite Pencils, Wax Crayons, Markers, Chalk, Charcoal, Pastels & Cont√©, Basic Shapes, Complex Shapes, Shape Outlines, Patterns, and Textures ‚Ä¢ All brushes can be used as a Wet Brush, Dry Brush (Blending), or Eraser ‚Ä¢ Over 20 different settings are available to customize brush strokes with powerful versatility and variation The Best Painting App for iPad ‚Ä¢ Sorcery‚Ñ¢, the fastest 64-bit painting engine on the App Store ‚Ä¢ Full-fledged Apple Pencil support for pressure, tilt angle, orientation, and double-tap ‚Ä¢ Smart Keyboard support with over 20 context-sensitive keyboard shortcuts ‚Ä¢ Create a canvas of any size up to 16K (64MP) on iPad Pro ‚Ä¢ Dual-texture brushes ‚Ä¢ 64-bit colour ‚Ä¢ All device orientations are supported all the time ‚Äî switch from portrait to landscape painting with ease ‚Ä¢ 1000 levels of undo and redo are available ‚Ä¢ Touch and slide hotspots can be used to quickly change brush size, opacity, and pressure without opening a menu ‚Ä¢ The eyedropper tool can be used with a touch and hold gesture to select paint colours from the canvas ‚Ä¢ The canvas can be moved around, rotated, and zoomed in and out up to 6400% Canvas Playback Video Recording ‚Ä¢ Brush strokes are automatically recorded as you paint without any delay ‚Ä¢ You can play the video of your artwork being created stroke-by-stroke directly in the gallery ‚Ä¢ Exported videos are high quality HD at up to 1080p resolution Full-Featured Colour Picker ‚Ä¢ Choose any paint colour you can dream of with the intuitive colour picker ‚Ä¢ HSB and RGB sliders accompany a large colour circle, colour square, and opacity slider ‚Ä¢ Your latest colours are saved to a palette automatically while you paint ‚Ä¢ You can also save your favourite colours to a palette with drag and drop Visit snowCanoe.com to check out more screenshots, videos and artwork.

Application Screenshot

iPad

ÈªÑÈ∏≠ËØÅ‰ª∂ÁÖßÔºå Â∞èÁ∫¢‰π¶Âçö‰∏ªÊé®ËçêÔºåÊäñÈü≥Ë∂ÖÁÉ≠Èó®ËØÅ‰ª∂ÁÖßAPPÔºåÊ±ÇËÅåÊ±ÇÂ≠¶ÂøÖÂ§áÔºÅ ‰∏∫‰ªÄ‰πàÈÄâÊã©ÈªÑÈ∏≠ËØÅ‰ª∂ÁÖßÔºü ‰∏ÄÊ¨°‰ªòË¥π‰∏ãËΩΩÔºåÊ∞∏‰πÖ‰ΩøÁî®ÔºåËøòÂèØËÆæÁΩÆÂàÜ‰∫´ÁªôÊúãÂèãÂÆ∂‰∫∫Ôºà‰æùÁÖßiCloudÂÆ∂Â∫≠Ë¥¶Êà∑ËßÑÂàôÔºâ ‚Äú‰∏ÄÊ¨æÂäüËÉΩÂº∫Â§ßÁöÑËØÅ‰ª∂ÁÖßÂà∂‰ΩúËΩØ‰ª∂ÔºåÁî®Êà∑ÂèØÂÖçË¥π‰øùÂ≠òÊó†Ê∞¥Âç∞ÁîµÂ≠êËØÅ‰ª∂ÁÖßÂà∞ÊâãÊú∫Áõ∏ÂÜåÔºåËøòÊúâ‰ºóÂ§öÂÆûÁî®Â∞èÂ∑•ÂÖ∑ÂäüËÉΩÁ≠â‰Ω†Êé¢Á¥¢„ÄÇ‚Äù ===ÁôæÁßçËØÅ‰ª∂ÁÖßÂ∞∫ÂØ∏ÔºåÂ§ü‰∏ì‰∏ö=== ÂåÖÂê´1ÂØ∏„ÄÅ2ÂØ∏„ÄÅ3ÂØ∏„ÄÅ4ÂØ∏Á≠âÂ∏∏ËßÑÂ∞∫ÂØ∏ÔºåÂêåÊó∂Êèê‰æõÁôæ‰ΩôÁßçÂÆòÊñπÊåáÂÆöËØÅÁÖßËßÑÊ†ºÔºåÂ¶ÇÔºöÊØï‰∏öÁÖß„ÄÅÂ≠¶‰ΩçÁÖß„ÄÅÂÖ•Â≠¶ÁÖßÁ≠âÂ≠¶ÁîüËØÅÁÖßÔºõ‰ºöËÆ°„ÄÅËÄÉÁ†î„ÄÅËÆ°ÁÆóÊú∫„ÄÅÂÖ¨Âä°Âëò„ÄÅÂåªÊä§„ÄÅËÄÉÁ†î„ÄÅÂπºÂ∏àÂèäËØ≠Ë®ÄÁ±ªËÄÉËØïËØÅÁÖßÔºõËøòÊúâÁ§æ‰øù„ÄÅÁ≠æËØÅ„ÄÅÁÆÄÂéÜ„ÄÅÈ©æÁÖßÁ≠âÂÖ∂‰ªñÁ±ªÊª°Ë∂≥ÊÇ®ÁöÑÂêÑÁ±ªÊãçÊëÑÂú∫ÊôØÈúÄÊ±Ç„ÄÇËΩØ‰ª∂Êô∫ËÉΩÊé®Âá∫ÂΩì‰∏ãÁÉ≠Èó®ÁöÑËØÅ‰ª∂ÁÖßÂ∞∫ÂØ∏ÔºåËÆ©‰Ω†Êõ¥Âø´Êç∑È´òÊïàÁöÑÁî®ÊâãÊú∫Âà∂‰ΩúËØÅ‰ª∂ÁÖßÔºÅ ===‰∏ÄÈîÆÊä†ÂõæÊç¢ËÉåÊôØÔºåÂ§üÊô∫ËÉΩ=== Âèë‰∏ùÁ∫ßÊä†ÂõæÂºïÊìéÔºåpsÂ∞èÁôΩÁöÑÁ¶èÈü≥ÔºÅÂÇªÁìúÂºèÊìç‰ΩúÊô∫ËÉΩÊä†ÂõæÔºåÈÖçÂêàÂ§öÂÖÉÂåñËÉåÊôØÂ∫ïËâ≤ÔºåÈô§‰∫ÜÂ∏∏ËßÑÁ∫¢ËìùÁôΩÔºåËøòÂ¢ûÂä†È´òÁ∫ßËâ≤ÂíåÁ≥ñÊûúËâ≤ÔºåÂèØÊ†πÊçÆ‰∏çÂêåÁöÑ‰ΩøÁî®Âú∫ÊôØÈöèÊÑèÂàáÊç¢„ÄÇÂ±ïÁé∞‰Ω†ÊúÄÁæéÊ∞îË¥®ÁöÑÂêåÊó∂ÔºåÁ°Æ‰øùËØÅ‰ª∂ÁÖßÁöÑ‰∏ì‰∏öÂêàËßÑÊÄßÔºå‰∏ÄÂõæÂ§öÁî®‰∏çÊòØÊ¢¶ÔºåÊóßÂõæÊîπÈÄ†ËøòËÉΩÁî®ÔºÅ ===Ë∂ÖËá™ÁÑ∂ÁæéÈ¢úÁæéÂ¶ÜÔºåÂ§üÈ´òÁ∫ß=== AIÊô∫ËÉΩÁÆóÊ≥ïÊèê‰æõÁ£®ÁöÆ„ÄÅÁæéÁôΩ„ÄÅÁò¶ËÑ∏„ÄÅÁ≠âÁæéÈ¢úÂäüËÉΩ„ÄÇÊõ¥ÊúâÈÄÇÂêàÊáí‰∫∫„ÄÅÊâãÊÆãÂÖöÁöÑ‰∏ÄÈîÆÂºèÂåñÂ¶ÜÔºåÊª°Ë∂≥‰Ω†ÂØπËá™ÁÑ∂Â¶Ü„ÄÅÁî∑Á•ûÂ¶Ü„ÄÅÂ•≥Á•ûÂ¶ÜÁöÑÈúÄÊ±ÇÔºåÊîØÊåÅËá™ÂÆö‰πâÂ¶ÜÂÆπÁ®ãÂ∫¶„ÄÇ‰∏ÄÈîÆËøòÂéüÊúÄÁæé‰∏îÁúüÂÆûÁöÑ‰Ω†ÔºåÊâìÈÄ†ÂÆåÁæé„ÄÅËá™ÁÑ∂„ÄÅÈ´òÁ∫ßÊÑüËÑ∏Â∫ûÔºåÂëäÂà´ËØÅÁÖß‰∏çÁæéÊó∂‰ª£ÔºÅ ===Êµ∑ÈáèÊúçÈ•∞Âú®Á∫øÊç¢ÔºåÂ§üÊ≠£Âºè=== ‰∏çÂêåÈ£éÊ†ºÁöÑÁî∑Ë£Ö„ÄÅÂ•≥Ë£Ö„ÄÅÁ´•Ë£ÖÔºåÊª°Ë∂≥Â§öÁßçÂú∫ÊôØÈúÄÊ±ÇÁöÑÂêåÊó∂ÔºåÊîØÊåÅËá™Âä©Ë∞ÉËäÇÊúçÈ•∞Â§ßÂ∞èÂíå‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºåÊê≠ÈÖçÊ∂àÈô§Á¨îË∞ÉÊï¥ÁªÜËäÇÔºåÊïàÊûúÁÆÄÁõ¥ÂÆåÁæéÔºÅ -ÈöêÁßÅÊîøÁ≠ñÔºöhttps://shimo.im/docs/qKVR8J3PQKtGHKk6/ -ÊúçÂä°Êù°Ê¨æÔºöhttps://www.freeprivacypolicy.com/live/8d648196-576f-4b7b-a889-01476e5f167b https://idcamera-834ff.web.app

entry.title: Backyard Baseball '01
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

STEP UP TO THE PLATE Relive the second baseball game in the Backyard Sports franchise, now enhanced to run on iOS. Whether you're picking your dream team, playing a pick-up game, or diving into a full season, step up to the plate and experience the game that made baseball fun for everyone! Backyard Baseball ‚Äò01 teams up the Backyard kids with Backyardified MLB legends. Create your own Backyard team, customize your uniforms, and strategize to win the Championship. Play a single pick-up game or play through an entire season. Backyard Baseball ‚Äò01 features intuitive controls for all ages! SWING BACK INTO BASEBALL Enjoy baseball like it‚Äôs 2001! 30 Charming Backyard kids Legendary MLB Players MLB Team Marks Hilarious Bloopers 8 Classic Ballparks 9 Pitching Power-ups and 4 batting Power-ups Lively commentary from Sunny Day and Vinnie To get into the swing of things, choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you‚Äôll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit the ball! THE GOAT RETURNS Play with the legend himself, Pablo Sanchez. Build a roster from a cast of 30 hilarious child athletes and 28 legendary pros that made Backyard Baseball ‚Äò01 a sports classic. Returning MLB players include Derek Jeter, Alex Rodriguez, Cal Ripken Jr., Sammy Sosa, Mike Piazza, Randy Johnson, Nomar Garciaparra, Jeff Bagwell, Jason Giambi, Chipper Jones, Jeromy Burnitz, Mark McGwire, Shawn Green, Vladimir Guerrero, Kenny Lofton, Jason Kendall, Barry Larkin, Marty Cordova, Mo Vaughn, Raul Mondesi, Curt Schilling, Alex Gonzalez, Juan Gonzalez, Larry Walker, Carlos Beltran, Tony Gwynn, Ivan Rodriguez, and Jose Canseco. Game Modes include: Choose from three modes of play (Easy Mode, Medium Mode, Hard Mode) Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself and the game starts immediately. Single Game: You take turns with the computer choosing players from a random pool of characters. Season: You pick your home field, create a team, and manage the team through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season, the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). If you keep winning, you‚Äôll compete in the Super Entire Nation Tournament and Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series! ADDITIONAL INFORMATION At our core, we are fans first ‚Äì not just of video games, but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver. Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. As an example, we can‚Äôt use the original 32bit code to support modern macOS, as even with an incredibly clever wrapper, macOS can‚Äôt execute the binaries. Backyard Baseball ‚Äò01 runs well, looks better than ever, includes new bonus features to test your mettle, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the game.

Application Description

„ÄåCard.Note„ÄçÔºöÊØè‰∏™ÂøµÂ§¥ÈÉΩÂÄºÂæóÁî®ÂøÉËÆ∞ÂΩï ËøôÊòØ‰∏ÄÊ¨æ‰ª•Âç°Áâá‰∏∫‰∏ªË¶ÅËÆæËÆ°ÁêÜÂøµÁöÑÊûÅÁÆÄËÆ∞‰∫ã App „ÄÇ ‰Ω†ÂÜôÁöÑÊØè‰∏ÄÊÆµÊñáÂ≠óÈÉΩÂèØ‰ª•ÁîüÊàê‰∏ÄÂº†Âº†Á≤æÁæéÁöÑÂç°Áâá „ÄÇ ‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•Áî®ÂÆÉÊù•ÂÜôËØó„ÄÅÁü≠Êñá„ÄÅÈöèÊÉ≥Ôºõ ‰πüÂèØ‰ª•Áî®ÂÆÉÊù•ÂÜôÊó•ËÆ∞„ÄÅÊ∏ÖÂçï„ÄÅËßÑÂàí„ÄÅË¶Å‰∫ãÊèêÈÜíÔºõ ËøòÂèØ‰ª•Áõ¥Êé•Áî®ËØ≠Èü≥ËæìÂÖ•Êù•ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏™Áû¨Èó¥ÁöÑÂøµÂ§¥„ÄÇ „ÄåCard.Note„Äç‰πùÂ§ßÁâπÁÇπÔºö 1.ÊûÅÁÆÄËÆæËÆ° Âæ™ÁùÄÊûÅÁÆÄÁöÑËÆæËÆ°ÁêÜÂøµÔºåÁªìÂêàÂõæÊ†áÂèäÊâãÂäøÊìç‰ΩúÔºåËΩªÊùæ‰∏äÊâã„ÄÇ 2.ÂÖ®Â±ÄÂç°ÁâáÂåñ ÂÖÖÂàÜËûçÂÖ•‰∫ÜÂç°ÁâáËÆæËÆ°ÁêÜÂøµÔºåÂèØÊ†πÊçÆÂñúÂ•ΩÈöèÊÑèÂàáÊç¢Ê®™ÁâàÊàñÁ´ñÁâà‰∏§ÁßçÂç°ÁâáÁ¨îËÆ∞ÊòæÁ§∫Ê†∑Âºè„ÄÇ 3.ÂÖ®Â±ÄÊâãÂäøÂåñ ‰∏ãÊãâÂèØÊñ∞Âª∫Á¨îËÆ∞ÔºåÂÜç‰∏ãÊãâÂèØ‰øùÂ≠òÁ¨îËÆ∞ÔºåÂè≥ÊªëÂèØÂëºÂá∫‰ΩúÂìÅÈõÜÔºåÈïøÊåâÂç°ÁâáÂèØÈ¢ÑËßàÂç°ÁâáÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÄÇ 4.ËØ≠Èü≥ÂΩïÂÖ• ÊâìÂºÄ‰æøÂèØÁõ¥Êé•ËØ≠Èü≥ËæìÂÖ•ÔºåÈöèÊó∂ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏™ÁÅµÂÖâÊòæÁé∞ÁöÑÊÉ≥Ê≥ï„ÄÇ‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•ÊääÂÆÉÂΩì‰ΩúÊàêiOSÊñáËâ∫Áâà‚ÄúÈó™ÂøµËÉ∂Âõä‚Äù„ÄÇ 5.Ë¶Å‰∫ãÊèêÈÜíÔºö ÂèØËÆæÁΩÆÊèêÈÜíÈóπÁßçÔºåÈáçË¶Å‰∫ãÊÉÖÂíåËÆ°Âàí‰∏çÂÜçÈîôÂ§±„ÄÇ 6.Âø´Êç∑È´òÊïà ÊîØÊåÅ3D-TouchÂèäWidgetÂ∞èÁªÑ‰ª∂ÂäüËÉΩÔºåÂèØÁõ¥Êé•Âú®Â∫îÁî®ÂõæÊ†áÊàñWidgetÂø´ÈÄüÊâìÂºÄÂ∫îÁî®ÊàñÁõ¥Êé•ËøõÂÖ•ÂàõÂª∫Á¨îËÆ∞ÁïåÈù¢ÔºåËÆ©‰Ω†ÈöèÊó∂È´òÊïàÂú∞ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏™ÂøµÂ§¥„ÄÇ 7.ÊñáÈùíÂÆöÂà∂ Á≤æÈÄâ‰∫Ü 10 Ê¨æËÆ∞‰∫ãÂ≠ó‰ΩìÂèä 9 ÁßçÊñáÈùí‰∏ªÈ¢òËâ≤Âç°„ÄÅÂ§öËææ 100 Áßç‰∏çÂêåÈ¢úËâ≤ÁöÑËâ≤Âç°ÔºåÂèØÊ†πÊçÆÂñúÂ•ΩÂÆöÂà∂ÂêÑÁßçÂç°Áâá„ÄÇ 8.iCloud‰∫ëÂêåÊ≠• ÊîØÊåÅiCloud‰∫ëÂêåÊ≠•ÔºåÂ§öÂè∞ËÆæÂ§áÈó¥Êï∞ÊçÆÂèØ‰ªªÊÑèÂêåÊ≠•„ÄÇ 9.Ê∑±Ëâ≤Ê®°Âºè ÂÖ®Â±ÄÈÄÇÈÖçÊ∑±Ëâ≤Ê®°ÂºèÔºåËßÜËßâËàíÈÄÇ‰∏çÂà∫Áúº„ÄÇ ÊÑüË∞¢‰∏ãËΩΩÔºåÁîüÊ¥ªÊÑâÂø´„ÄÇ Â¶ÇÊúâÈóÆÈ¢òÊàñÂª∫ËÆÆÔºåËØ∑ËÅîÁ≥ªÂºÄÂèëËÄÖ ÂæÆÂçöÔºöPoPoemÂºÄÂèëËÄÖ ÈÇÆÁÆ±Ôºöyande18@126.com

entry.title: Oh! Edo Towns
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

Plunge into the past for a rousing romp through Edo period Japan! Your ideal samurai town awaits you! Erect houses, castles, and all manner of medieval marvels with a touch of the finger--rewriting the pages of history as you see fit! Strategically place compatible buildings to make "combos," boosting your Yield to become the best castle town in all the land! ---- Turn your device to rotate the screen, touch to scroll, and pinch to zoom in and out. Supports iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad. Note: Screen rotation and zoom are only available on iPhone 3GS and later, iPod touch 2nd generation and later, and iPad. The game now lets you switch between English and Japanese. Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Ninja Village
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

Rewrite the history of feudal Japan with an army of the ultimate guerrilla warriors: ninjas! The shogun has fallen from power, plunging the land into chaos as feuding feudal lords scramble to take his place. But the shogun has an ace up his sleeve: you! As the head of a leading ninja clan, it's up to you to rally your followers and help unify Japan! As their fearless leader, you'll need to train your fellow ninjas in the ways of modern 16th-century warfare--including the use of those newfangled matchlock guns! Assign them to infantry, cavalry, and other units to form an army fit for a shogun! Of course, war is costly in more ways than one. Between battles, your followers will raise funds by producing food, handicrafts, and other goods to sell to passing travellers. Arm your ninjas with the best gear, training, and skills and lead them to victory in the struggle for unification! You may even meet some of the era's greatest generals along the way... --- Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Zoo Park Story
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫249,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

Ready to build the zoo of your dreams? Depart on wild adventures to find exotic fauna, exploring all manner of environments from savanna to tundra, jungle and beyond! Give your new animal friends a home and take your zoo to the top of the industry! Savor the thrill of opening day. Feed the animals in your burgeoning lineup‚Äîeven give them the occasional treat to show you care! From apples to acorns, meat, and more, tailor your critters' diet according to their natural habitat. On that note, do the same with the surrounding flora too! Your customers will also require expert care. Develop your zoo's infrastructure, installing benches, fountains, and the odd hot dog stand to make sure zoo-goers stay satisfied till close. Propel your place to mega-park proportions and you'll even be able to start an on-site shuttle! What's more, if you're lucky, two of your critters who share the same pen may find romance‚Äîresulting in the grand gift of life! Potential partners can be found via the Animal Hub or when out exploring. But be forewarned; the latter method requires animals be won over through a heated battle of negotiation! Well, what are you waiting for? Build a top-ranking zoo, set social media ablaze, and show the world your wild side! Supports drag to scroll and pinch to zoom. Search for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games! Kairosoft's pixel art game series continues! Follow us on Twitter for the latest Kairosoft news and information. https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Dream Park Story
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫249,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

Throw open the gates to a magical kingdom of fun and thrills! Create and customize your own amusement park. From humble attractions like the teacup ride or trampolines, you'll be able to build up to bigger and better things. You can even hire mascots and hold fantastic parades! What do your visitors like best? How can you improve? There's no better place to check up-to-the-minute feedback than the park's social media. Work hard, and you might attract the attention of famous online influencers! Running out of space to build new rides? No problem! Just call your friendly neighborhood construction company to expand the park grounds. Soon you'll be setting up Ferris wheels, roller coasters, and other large-scale attractions to catch the eyes of prospective customers passing by. Don't forget about mascots - these cute and quirky characters are the first things people will think of when they talk about your park! You'll be able to scout a new mascot every year. Signing one will give you access to special themed areas, like the the Space Zone, Snow Zone, and Desert Zone. Keep increasing your popularity and delight your visitors with spectacular parades! The more impressed your visitors are, the more points you'll earn. These can be used to research new attractions and fixtures or add new functions to existing ones. Give your fans an experience they'll never forget and work your way up through the rankings! Take your first step on the roller coaster ride of amusement park management! What kind of park will YOU create? -- Supports drag to scroll and pinch to zoom. Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games! Kairosoft's pixel art game series continues! Follow us on Twitter for the latest Kairosoft news and information. https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Game Dev Story
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

Manage your own game company and try to create a million-selling game in this unique simulation. Features the ability to develop your company's own game console, plus a system for changing your staff members' professions. Hire talented people and train them to develop their skills. As your staff gets more experience, you will unlock a wider array of game genres and content to develop. Try to find the most popular combinations and develop for the latest platform! Your staff members can have a variety of game-related professions, from programmer to sound engineer. Work hard and you may reach the top of the video game industry! -- Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games! https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

entry.title: Station Manager
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫249,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

All aboard this exciting journey to build the world's greatest train station! Customize your station with your favorite facilities and trains. Help your passengers travel in comfort by adding vending machines, benches, information boards and more. With fun features including arcades, VIP lounges and taco stands, you'll soon be everyone's favorite stop! Link different carriages to create new trains for business, tourism and more. Expand into the surrounding area to attract new passengers. It's full steam ahead for your spectacular new station! Watch as it fills with commuters, students and other travelers! -------------------------------------------------------- All game progress is stored on your device. Save data cannot be restored after deleting or reinstalling the app. Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games! Follow us on X(Twitter) for the latest news! https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

entry.title: Skating Rink Story
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫299,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

Application Description

Let the elegant sound of carefully sharpened metal on meticulously maintained ice ring through your ears as you manage your very own ice skating rink. Train up your eager staff and enter them into competitions. But first things first‚Äîyou're going to need a huge rink, a place where your customers can glide with glee. And you never know when a carefully placed object on the ice may lead to an impromptu photoshoot. Make sure your skaters are warm and happy off the ice with a heated room and soup bar. Some people might even post their experiences on social media, too! Keep customers coming back by listening to their requests, like increasing the food choices at your rink. And with the right combination, who knows what amazing dishes you may discover! You can't skate on an empty stomach, after all! You're also going to need a capable instructor or two to teach skaters all kinds of amazing tricks and bring out their full potential! And once they master the basics, have them create a figure-skating program and enter competitions! Their success on the ice will mean more business for your rink! Looks like even the mayor from the town over has heard about your rink and come to check it out for themselves! With this kind of popularity, it won't be long until you have people coming from all over the world! Now, get ready to create countless wonderful memories with your skaters, and aim to turn your rink into an unforgettable, 5-star facility! Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!
